author: Justine Coleman
title: Group of pastors sue California officials for 'criminalizing' church attendance
description: A group of pastors filed a lawsuit Monday against California officials including Gov. Gavin Newsom (D), for "criminalizing" church attendance with stay-at-home orders meant to combat the spread of the coronavirus....
content: A group of pastors filed a lawsuit Monday against California officials including Gov. Gavin NewsomGavin Christopher NewsomCalifornia to release plan for lifting coronavirus restrictionsWest Coast governors announce they will create joint plan for reopening ec… [+2685 chars]
